channel.title: All my Server, Rune fusion, Bs-pkz, 595 lookalike, scarescape, Corby Xevolution!
channel.description:
[CENTER]Rune Fusion [PI] open source&client
Do not ask me why im Re-releasing this again, because there are so damn much Requests for this :S
dont worry guys this one is open client and open source so go ahead and leech. anyways this is SHIT
client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?82y9oolbk30dnen]Rune Fusion client.rar[/url]
source: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?24b7uuvpjjpaaqt]Rune Fusion source.rar[/url]
[B]old client download without 508 maps:[/B] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?7o1ouy83oez0jl4]http://www.mediafire.com/?7o1ouy83oez0jl4[/url]
[SPOILER="508 MAPS!"]maps that doesnt show on the pics but they are: godwars warriors guild new barb. zanaris? jatiz lunar isle varrock fountain adn some more of it etc.
Some 508+ maps:[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="508 maps Pictures:"] [IMG]http://img830.imageshack.us/img830/2856/werewr.png[/img] [IMG]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/2962/saddws.png[/img] [IMG]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/9726/ssssswp.png[/img] [IMG]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/8999/dsfsdf.png[/img] [IMG]http://img243.imageshack.us/img243/1439/ert534.png[/img] [IMG]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/9154/erwerk.png[/img] [IMG]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/958/ewri.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[COLOR=orange]Server features:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=teal]Pest control Barrows Duel Arena Fight Pits PVP points. Godwars Zombieminigame(not finished) Extremly good Combat system! New Slayer system Content 474 Data(some maps) Skillcapes Vengeance [/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Client Features:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Teal]New Client Layout new welcome screen added Pest control Interface Godwars map Warriors Guild (still in progress) Neitznot map(still in progress) New Toggle menu(thx to nickname) Combat interface New skill interface! Gamframe toggle x10 HP toggle new/old splat toggle new/old hp toggle Lunar interface[/COLOR]
[SPOILER="Other Pictures"]New GWD Update: [IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/2432/51909976.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img180.imageshack.us/img180/678/2dmhya.png[/img] [IMG]http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/6241/naamloosmh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/wvubdi.jpg[/img] [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/29yi9w5.gif[/img] [img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/3907/93017870.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/7716/serverpicture1wlz3p.png[/img] [IMG]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/9973/serverpicture10ycwvh.png[/img] [IMG]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/7553/42388689.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/8040/34402508.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/5328/41558333.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/510/55419628.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/6446/45160962.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/5312/89455475.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/8493/untitleeed.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/2415/untitrled3.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/2070/72349543.gif[/img][/SPOILER][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Release! if you leech atleast give credits :)
Source donwload link: [b]ONLY 582 KB.!!!!![/b] [url=http://www.multiupload.com/E16ARSJ50Q]http://www.multiupload.com/E16ARSJ50Q[/url]
Client download link: [url=http://www.multiupload.com/PK0MUR0095]http://www.multiupload.com/PK0MUR0095[/url]
[QUOTE]Hello everyone, so i was coding this source for 1 month ago, and this is the result!
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/301gi9f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2z8sp3t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/zoajb9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/ri6iyd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/24l65y0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2pqjcec.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/egnxoo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2hpt0s7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/169fd5y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/25sopjt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/33o0f9j.png[/img]
Base: Ddspeced
Minigames: Fight cave's: 99% Fight pits: 100% (perfect timers) Barrows: 100% (all tunnels) GWD: 100% Pest control: 95% need monster! Assualt: 70% need to change score's
Bosses:
KBD: 100% (perfect gfx's) General Graador: 100% (animated) Chaos Element: 95% (fixing drop) Kalphite Queen: 100% Dagannoth Kings: 95% (need al monsters)
Skills: Cooking - 100% Crafting - 100% Fishing 100% Fletching - 100% Herblore - 100% Mining - 100% Runecrafting - 100% Slayer - 100% Smithing - 95% Thieving - 100%: Woodcutting - 100% agility: - 99% firemaking: - 100% farming: - 90%
Credits: Swat, Bluurr, Galkon, Valentino, Jamiz[/QUOTE]
[/CENTER]
[center] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2hxbkg9.png[/img] [size=12pt][b] there where so many question about how to remove the anti-leech, but much people couldnt figure it out, many people requested this so here it is without anti-leech etc.. and i cleaned the source a little bit up for you guys![/b][/size]
So, if some people know, i lost al my [b]RSPS[/b] files a few days ago, i also lost my project. but dont worry i come here with an new project called: [b][u]Corby Xevolution[/u][/b] the server base im using is [u]Delta[/u] with [u]Bluurs[/u] client, oke i know start flaming, i dont care. i got this server from my friend xparadisex he made few features, but im gonna make them don and perfect. such as: [u]99%[/u] skillcape emotes, gwd, etc..
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/i6d1n7.png[/img]
[b]Me -Lost Valentino- (Corby Xevolution)[/b]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/neuixu.png[/img] Godwars Pest Control Perfect pking Assualt [pre][b]Skills:[/b] [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Attack.png[/img]- Done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Strength.png[/img]-Done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Defence.png[/img]-Done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Hitpoints.png[/img]- Done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Range.png[/img]- Done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Prayer.png[/img]- almost done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Magic.png[/img]- done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Cooking.png[/img]- done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Fishing.png[/img]-done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Theiving.png[/img]- 95% done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Crafting.png[/img]- done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/agility.png[/img]- 99% [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Herblore.png[/img]- 100% [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Firemaking.png[/img]- 99% done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Fletchingcopy.png[/img]- done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Woodcutting.png[/img]- done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Runescarfting.png[/img]- 55% done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Slayer.png[/img]- done [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Smithing.png[/img]- 15% d [img]http://i558.photobucket.com/albums/ss30/Crobar11/Mining.png[/img]- 90% done[/pre]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/ohca0.png[/img] begin project client loading now 474 content [code]All items? Yes All npcs? 80% All anims? 30% All models? 70% All maps? No impossible All gfx? 60%No[/code] [u][b]ADDED ALL SKILLCAPE EMOTE"S![/b][/u] Added new minigame tele added new modern [u]magic[/u] new [b]fight cave [/b]floor+[b]1 [/b]new model [b]godwars[/b] added new[b] 474 [/b]skill tab new [u]trade interface[/u]
soz i fucked up magic and agility skillcape gfx's
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/14alavq.png[/img] skillcape's (not all): [b]PRAYER[/b] [b]Magic [/b] [b]runecrafting[/b], [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2eci637.gif[/img][img]http://i40.tinypic.com/rgxav8.gif[/img][img]http://i43.tinypic.com/4jnvyf.gif[/img] [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/1079/0007t.png[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/2493/0003z.png[/img] [img]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/9210/0002s.png[/img] [img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/8928/0000.png[/img] new bank interface [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/4hpi4n.png[/img] New logout/ safewild/ quest tab! [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/s611mt.png[/img] old Pest control Interface (removed shitty/buggy interface's!) [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/o0uq8l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2s91x7s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/wlaby9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2czbsq9.png[/img] D claws statius hammer Vesta longsword emote's [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2u8gsia.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/ok4rh5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/ejsoih.png[/img]
Download link without anti-leech! http://www.mediafire.com/?ikf5njmygjz
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/20j4hf4.png[/img] Delta Bluurr Me -[b]Lost Valentino[/b]- (Corby Xevolution)[/center] [code] here are all my other releases: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,436909.msg3210298.html#msg3210298 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,428218.msg3144153.html#msg3144153 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,434133.msg3187702.html#msg3187702 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,438857.msg3227076.html#msg3227076[/code]
[b][center]click me if you support! [URL=http://'http://fancheck.110mb.com/support.php?id=Corby-Xevolution'][IMG]http://fancheck.110mb.com/image.php?id=Corby-Xevolution[/img][/URL][/center][/b]
[center]So i decided to release my project, because of my final exams, and after that, i havnt much time because of work(40 hours a week), so here it is, and if i sometimes got time im trying to fix so glitches;)
it's a [b][u]595 look a like[/u][/b] with client base, i took Galkons Refactored, this is the first time that i worked with renamed so dont flame, server base is i think from rich, i found it few weeks ago in my C: drive.
[b][i]here are some bugs that i have fixed, and that you self need to fix:[/i][/b] [code]°logout doesnt hover/clicked °you can walk over sprites (u will see when u dl) [s]°second login box isnt finished [/s] °minimap clicking area isnt moved yet (havnt look for this yet) [s]°if you click with left mouse click, then its the same af right mouse click[/s][/code]
so this server is just beta, if you got dupes, or bugs dont come to me and tell it, because i already know. you can use this as your blank,or base server![/center]
[u]Server features:[/u] [b] * Updated farming, added Spirit tree patch * Clue scrolls, dropped by most monsters, with real Clue scroll rewards as RuneScape * Kalphite queen, with same drops as RuneScape * Ice caves, with mithril dragons * Mage Training arena, with working exchange * Replaced Seers teleport with Miscellania * Item dialog * Updated Slayer tower, replaced Dark beasts with Nechryaels, and added a teleport to Dark beasts from Duradeal * Walking Npc's * Shilo Village, with working Skiller minigame, 1500+ Total to play * Working Vengeance * Mage bank, with working sparkling pool, working statue's for god capes * Working mage arena, with levers, axe hut, pirate hut, Chaos elemental, and rouges * Clan wars area * Ingame Highscores board * Working crystal keys, and dragon halfs * Working crystal bow animation * TzHaar, with drops just like RuneScape, and working Obby weapons/armor * Hole's in mouth bug fixed, on all hoods, and helmets * Low train & Mid train portal's at the Start area * New Staff Zone * Updated Dragon area, they have been moved to the wilderness * Fixed Crystal, Karils, and Seercull bows to train Range now instead of Melee * Potions now work 99% * Boss monsters * Fixed cooking & fishing * Working high alching * Shops * Perfect ground item pickuping * Trade Channel * Taverly * Slayer Tower * Working Farming patches * Barrows Minigame * thieving work * good combact working * NOT LUNAR, ancient mage and normal mage *woodcutting is work -and much more figure it out;)[/b]
[center]Pictures: [img]http://www.uploadgeek.com/image-4012_4C0698EC.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.uploadgeek.com/image-885D_4C06994A.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.uploadgeek.com/image-8EE9_4C069992.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.uploadgeek.com/image-593F_4C0699DF.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.uploadgeek.com/image-E009_4C069A08.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.uploadgeek.com/image-0B8D_4C069A29.jpg[/img] [b] download the server and see more features ;)[/b]
[size=18pt]Download link (ONLY 15 mb) :[/size] http://www.mediafire.com/?liznzmzutmy http://www.megaupload.com/?d=U5W8QM27
[b][u]Notice this is almost (blank), so dont ask dumb question, why didnt you add skillcape, god godwars baosse, or gs stances, etc etc..!!!!![/u][/center][/b]
So i saw my old thread and i saw many comments about the client and the source, so i decide to make them betther like: put shit stuff away from the client and the source.
i have also made a new client with a new Gui. and putted a fresh new cache into it!
[center]Hello here is my first server ive ever made it has alot of command and custom and much new arear and features: [b]6 new pk places d claws full PVP armor new home new skills new train mod/admin/owner capes new 3rd age Fight pits working Castle wars working. real Veangeance working emote + GfX new starting gear new portals room all spirit shields! new shops player/mod/admin/co-owner/owner commands new ATTACK hit. new HD new water texture new floor. [/b]
see more features by ur self plz (:
here are the picz.[/center] "NEW PICS!" [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/4pwmmg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/xnbvys.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2dbqzqf.png[/img]
"OLD PICS [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/13ye63b.png[/img] [table][tr][td][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/jhygxw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/4lrmtk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1z145ys.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/et8oxd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/332xait.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/105wkko.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2jae1cp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2j439s7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/347gxht.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2s7w7ra.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2w4cks7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1686a1f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2hyxdet.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/beg0eo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/x6l85v.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ngvnle.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/34osfic.png[/img][/td][/tr][/table]
"NEW Download Links" Client download: [url=http://www.multiupload.com/F44RLOS1X9]NEW CLIENT DOANLOAD WITHOUT ANTI LEECH![/url] Source Download: [url=http://www.multiupload.com/CL6RPE3U7H]NEW SOURCE DOWNLOAD![/url]

[center]So i decided to release my project, because of my final exams, and after that, i havnt much time because of work(40 hours a week), so here it is, and if i sometimes got time im trying to fix so glitches;)

it’s a 595 look a like with client base, i took Galkons Refactored, this is the first time that i worked with renamed so dont flame, server base is i think from rich, i found it few weeks ago in my C: drive.

here are some bugs that i have fixed, and that you self need to fix:

°logout doesnt hover/clicked °you can walk over sprites (u will see when u dl) [s]°second login box isnt finished [/s] °minimap clicking area isnt moved yet (havnt look for this yet) [s]°if you click with left mouse click, then its the same af right mouse click[/s]

so this server is just beta, if you got dupes, or bugs dont come to me and tell it, because i already know.
you can use this as your blank,or base server![/center]

Server features:
* Updated farming, added Spirit tree patch
* Clue scrolls, dropped by most monsters, with real Clue scroll rewards as RuneScape
* Kalphite queen, with same drops as RuneScape
* Ice caves, with mithril dragons
* Mage Training arena, with working exchange
* Replaced Seers teleport with Miscellania
* Item dialog
* Updated Slayer tower, replaced Dark beasts with Nechryaels, and added a teleport to Dark beasts from Duradeal
* Walking Npc’s
* Shilo Village, with working Skiller minigame, 1500+ Total to play
* Working Vengeance
* Mage bank, with working sparkling pool, working statue’s for god capes
* Working mage arena, with levers, axe hut, pirate hut, Chaos elemental, and rouges
* Clan wars area
* Ingame Highscores board
* Working crystal keys, and dragon halfs
* Working crystal bow animation
* TzHaar, with drops just like RuneScape, and working Obby weapons/armor
* Hole’s in mouth bug fixed, on all hoods, and helmets
* Low train & Mid train portal’s at the Start area
* New Staff Zone
* Updated Dragon area, they have been moved to the wilderness
* Fixed Crystal, Karils, and Seercull bows to train Range now instead of Melee
* Potions now work 99%
* Boss monsters
* Fixed cooking & fishing
* Working high alching
* Shops
* Perfect ground item pickuping
* Trade Channel
* Taverly
* Slayer Tower
* Working Farming patches
* Barrows Minigame
* thieving work
* good combact working
* NOT LUNAR, ancient mage and normal mage
*woodcutting is work
-and much more figure it out;)
